mapper.select: SELECT BDIV_NO AS bDivNo , BDIV_NAME AS bDivName , ORDER_NO AS bDivOrder , BDIV_CODE AS bDivCode FROM SY_MENU_BIG_DIV ORDER BY ORDER_NO ASC
SELECT BDIV_NO AS bDivNo , SDIV_NAME AS sDivName , ORDER_NO AS bDivOrder , SDIV_PATH AS sDivPath , SDIV_CODE AS sDivCode , SDIV_PATH_PARAM AS SDIVPARAM FROM SY_MENU_SML_DIV ORDER BY ORDER_NO ASC

SELECT PRDT_NO , PRDT_TYPE , BDIV_CODE , SDIV_CODE , PRDT_NAME , PRDT_WARN , PRDT_DESC_PIC , PRDT_AMT , PRDT_PRICE , PRDT_BRAND , PIC_PATH FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM (SELECT PBI.PRDT_NO , PBI.PRDT_TYPE , PBI.BDIV_CODE , PBI.SDIV_CODE , PBI.PRDT_NAME , PBI.PRDT_WARN , PBI.PRDT_DESC_PIC , PBI.PRDT_AMT , PBI.PRDT_PRICE , PBI.PRDT_BRAND , PPI.PIC_PATH FROM PRDT_BASIC_INFO PBI , PRDT_PIC_INFO PPI WHERE PBI.PRDT_NO = PPI.PRDT_NO AND PPI.PIC_MAIN_FLAG = '1' ORDER BY PBI.PRDT_REG_DATE ASC ) a ) WHERE rn between#{pageBegin} AND #{pageEnd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRDT_BASIC_INFO PBI , PRDT_PIC_INFO PPI WHERE PBI.PRDT_NO = PPI.PRDT_NO AND PPI.PIC_MAIN_FLAG = '1' ORDER BY PBI.PRDT_REG_DATE ASC
